AuthorDetails.Name: Adam Werner
AuthorDetails.Description: A full stack developer with a particular focus on .NET development.  An Umbraco Certified Master.

Description: An xStatic plugin for deploying a static web site to an AWS S3 bucket for static site hosting.

RelatedPackages.Description: Static site builder providing the files to deploy to an S3 bucket.

Title: xStatic Deploy to AWS S3
